projects.title: Coffe Shop Ordering System
projects.Description: The Coffee Shop Ordering System is a multithreaded application designed to manage and streamline the daily operations of a coffee shop. It facilitates customer orders, inventory management, employee scheduling, and sales tracking in a simulated environment. The system is built using Java, leveraging multithreading to handle concurrent operations such as order processing, inventory updates, and customer interactions in a seamless and efficient manner.

projects.title: Banking Transaction System
projects.Description: The Multithreaded Banking Transaction System is a Java-based application designed to simulate a real-world banking environment where multiple customers can perform banking transactions simultaneously. The system uses multithreading to handle concurrent transactions such as deposits, withdrawals, and balance inquiries efficiently, ensuring smooth operation even during peak times.
